Intro.Message: There's one thing I never liked in our love story
Intro.SubMessage: And I am going to change it today, please swipe.

Intro.Message: You never swiped for me on Tinder! Never!!
I will get my revenge today
I spent a whole leap year writing why I love you
And you will need to swipe for every one of them
Intro.SubMessage: You can swipe up, left or right, anywhere. I'm being nice...

Intro.Message: I've been writing these reasons for a while. One a day, every day

Intro.SubMessage: Swipe for me... keep swiping for me

End.Message: I hope you now understand how much I love you
End.SubMessage: And I hope your fingers are ok

End.Message: So now, finish this and get changed
Go to the next bedroom, put some clothes on

End.SubMessage: But just before you forget... (swipe one last time)
